name: Fear (Kupotepo)
description:
Creator: Kupotepo & akoniti

This game is a part  of Spooktober Spooktacular Game Jam!  It is about Reid tries to get back to his home.

The Player's Guide: the monster walks in the certain directions and if the character touch the monster. It will cause an instant death.

Thank you everyone for giving a try.

The game cannot function  properly without help of @akoniti,  @Hedopepe, @Dragoncrash, @drusianai, @Human  and @ExtraVecchio

Update: the minor errors were found [fixed].

  • akoniti found two tiles priority issues [fixed].
  • akoniti found three sentences of the grammar error [fixed].
  • akoniti and I found the end cutscene error [fixed].
